name: nutrient supply from ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane | organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23664/documentation

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane'' for fertiliser use.;No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use. The purpose of this activity is to connect the chemical production of ''ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane'' with its generic uses as fertilizer. The product ''ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane'' is connected to the generic market for 'inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5 and inorganic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' through this supplying activity. In the agricultural context, ''ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane'' can be used directly as a fertilizer input to crop production, eventually with other chemicals; alternatively, a generic input of 'inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5 and inorganic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' can be used instead, and this will represent the regional consumption mix for his type of nutrient. A way in between is allowed by using the generic input 'inorganic phosphorus fertiliser, as P2O5 and inorganic potassium fertiliser, as K2O' and link to the activity providing it from a specific chemical.;In all cases, emissions associated to the application of the fertilizer have to be calculated in the crop production activity.

This inventory describes the supply of nutrients from ''ash, from combustion of bagasse from sugarcane'' for fertiliser use.

No machinery expenditures or emissions to the environment are considered related to the actual application of this substance on soil during its agricultural use.
